name: Crypto Daily Bollinger RSI Mean Reversion
description: Mean-reverting crypto strategy for BTC & ETH on daily bars. Uses Bollinger Bands (20,2) with RSI(14) to buy oversold dives below lower band (RSI<30) and short overbought spikes above upper band (RSI>70). Positions sized at 1 % of capital; ATR(14)-based stop (1.5× ATR) and profit target (3× ATR ≈2R or mid-band touch) implement conservative risk.
